title.narrative: SARPAM[ Southern Africa Regional Programme on Access to Medicines]

description.narrative: This activity (SARPAM[ Southern Africa Regional Programme on Access to Medicines]) is a component of Southern Africa Regional Programme on Access to Medicines reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £12,601,084. This component benefits South of Sahara, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Health policy and administrative management, Basic health care. , with the following implementing partners: PwC South Africa. The start date is 01-04-2009 and the end date is 31-12-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
